Articles.Content: Just landed on the surface of Tylo with Bill and Bob. They lost one of their engines (now unsymmetrical!) but they have enough thrust to reach orbit with one engine.

"Whose metal cone is this?"

"It's a Mk1 Command Pod, baby."

"Whose Mk1 Command Pod is this?"

"It's Jeb's."

"Who's Jeb?"

"Jeb's dead, baby. Jeb's dead."

Edited February 4, 2014 by Pestilence
My Jeb is on Pol right know. He stole a K-1 Rocket and is puzzling the meaning of being a kerbal.

I KNEW I FORGOT SOMETHING!

Sorry, Jeb.

I'm sure you'll like Eve after a while.

A long while.
In my career save everyone's at Kerbin atm. Jeb's alive IIRC, though he was "Missing in action" before. (Is there some option that turns on/off permadeath?)
He's manning my high orbit space station. Alone.
Currently chillin' in the Kerbonaut lounge.
He's a test pilot for my current 2045 ton lifter.
In Space. Definitely in Space.
On the VAB he was trying to test mechjeb Powered hover crafts.

My Jeb is busy, testing... EVERYTHING.

He always remains at home or close by in orbit so he can jump on the latest suic... rocket designs.

One word ;

Krakendrives...

He's chilling in the AstroLounge in the Astronaut Complex next to Bill and Bob, with a martini in his hands, waiting for his next transfer mission to the Freedom Space Station on the SSI Quark. He just got back from exploring the Jool System with the thing, and since the FSS always needs a new module replacement (Totally Danburt Kerman's fault), he's been reassigned to manage in-space tug ops. He's launching tomorrow to tug a science module from a 70km orbit to dock.
Revving up his respawn machine again after an accident in AEGIS's testing with physics warp and chute attachment. Bill and Bob are with him awaiting reconstitution after that hard return impact.
Praying that the Kraken is really dead
Dead via Inazuma Kick.
In orbit over Kerbin conducting orbital construction and debris removal operations.
Starving on the Mun. Alone. He's been up there a while...

Preparing for my next Minmus station expedition. Once the two upgraded landers are sent up he's headed that way too. Well, either that or I'll send him to supervise construction on my Mun station with the first crew rotation over there. Not entirely sure which right now.
Mine's currently sitting in a capsule on a ship being towed to Jool ... come to think of it, I should move him into the hitchhiker module, and get the science for high over Sun!

Where is my Jebediah? He is ALWAYS sneaking on board every ship I launch that has a pod on it, even though I don't WANT anybody on board. He's driving me nuts. I've had to re-do launches because I didn't notice the little bugger had snuck on board. Argh.

People used to joke that the Mercury astronauts had to remember to sweep the ape poo* off of their capsule seats before they got in... Jebediah is my ape poo.

*OK, they probably didn't say 'poo.'

dead.

Just dead.

'nuff said

Hes in space...And some of him may have de-orbited recently.Maybe his little pinkey is still on the polar icecaps on mars,haven't really recovered those.And I think that was his head I saw fly by on my SSTO flight to the Mun.

Where is my Jebediah? He is ALWAYS sneaking on board every ship I launch that has a pod on it, even though I don't WANT anybody on board. He's driving me nuts. I've had to re-do launches because I didn't notice the little bugger had snuck on board. Argh.

People used to joke that the Mercury astronauts had to remember to sweep the ape poo* off of their capsule seats before they got in... Jebediah is my ape poo.

*OK, they probably didn't say 'poo.'

I've got the same problem. Jeb's tried sneaking onto everything from station service modules to rescue ships to Gilly mini-landers. I think I'm gonna have to stick him in orbit somewhere just to keep him out of trouble.

Mission Director: Erm... Boss why would you want to speak to the crew? Boss: I want to know what Laythe looks like thats why! Mission Director : ( when they get back they will have Laythe as a map in their heads) If They Get Back Boss. I Mean Ermm... After they wake up.
